name: Mini Champions
description:
You can be the number one team in the world! Show you’re a football legend and win as many championships as you can. Forget those boring games with adapted joysticks and have fun with this unique touch football game.
Besides scoring your goals, you get extra points and badges for passing and retrieving the ball.
Compare your career with your Facebook friends and become the number one on your social network.

Features:
13 national teams.
78 different players
SuperShoot power
publishers: A G Programas de Computadores Ltda. - ME
